Burnt Buttered Noodles

time
15 minutes
serves
2
posted
21May2012
under
recipe
misc
permalink
comments?

Ingredients

  • 3 cups elbow macaroni
  • 1/2 stick butter

Instructions

cook noodles. drain. set aside.

in same pan, place butter on med-high heat until it turns a tan color (burns).

add noodles. mix. serve.

Burnt Buttered Noodles - May 21, 2012 -
